00030 #include <qpixmap.h>
00031 #include <qimage.h>
00032 #include <QMatrix>

00034 #include "KviCString.h"
00035 
00036 
00037 #include "object_macros.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 class KvsObject_pixmap : public KviKvsObject
00041 {
00042         Q_OBJECT
00043 //      Q_PROPERTY(QPixmap pixmap READ getPixmap)
00044 public:
00045         KVSO_DECLARE_OBJECT(KvsObject_pixmap)
00046         enum Type { Pixmap, AnimatedPixmap, Image };
00047         Type m_currentType;
00048         void setInternalPixmap(QPixmap *pPixmap);
00049         void setInternalImage(QImage *pImage);
00050 
00051         QImage * getImage()
00052         {
00053                 if(!m_pImage)
00054                         m_pImage = new QImage();
00055                 if(m_currentType==Pixmap)
00056                 {
00057                         if(m_pPixmap)
00058                         {
00059                                 *m_pImage = m_pPixmap->toImage();
00060                                 delete m_pPixmap;
00061                                 m_pPixmap = 0;
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064                 m_currentType = Image;
00065                 return m_pImage;
00066         }
00067 
00068         QPixmap * getPixmap()
00069         {
00070                 if(!m_pPixmap)
00071                         m_pPixmap = new QPixmap();
00072                 if(m_currentType==Image)
00073                 {
00074                         if(m_pImage)
00075                         {
00076                                 *m_pPixmap = m_pPixmap->fromImage(*m_pImage);
00077                                 delete m_pImage;
00078                                 m_pImage = 0;
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081                 m_currentType = Pixmap;
00082                 return m_pPixmap;
00083         }
00084 
00085 protected:
00086         KviAnimatedPixmap * m_pAnimatedPixmap;
00087         QPixmap * m_pPixmap;
00088         QImage * m_pImage;
00089 signals:
00090         void aboutToDie();
00091 protected:
00092         bool fill(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00093         bool resize(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00094         bool scale(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00095         //bool rotate(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00096         bool save(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00097         bool startAnimation(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00098         bool stopAnimation(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00099         bool loadAnimation(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00100         bool load(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00101         bool height(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00102         bool width(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00103         bool mirrored(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00104         bool grabWidget(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00105         bool loadFromMemoryBuffer(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00106         bool rotate(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00107         bool toGrayScale(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00108         bool setPixel(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00109         bool pixel(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00110         bool frameChangedEvent(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall *c);
00111 protected slots:
00112         void frameChanged();
00113 };
